title: BRIEF-China Information Technology ‍Entered Contract For Cloud-Based Elevator Ad Terminals
text:
February 12, 2018 / 1:56 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-China Information Technology ‍Entered Contract For Cloud-Based Elevator Ad Terminals Reuters Staff 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - China Information Technology Inc : 
* CHINA INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY INC - ‍ENTERED CONTRACT FOR SALE OF 3,000 CNIT CLOUD-BASED ELEVATOR AD TERMINALS 
* CHINA INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY INC - ‍CONTRACT IS EXPECTED TO GENERATE SALES AND SERVICE REVENUE TO CNIT OF ABOUT $1 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
